name: Green Makeout Insurrection
description:
A VR Dream Simulator/FPS about the struggles of doing a gamejam.

As a solo dev, you have to develop your game by day and sleep it all off at night. But who knows what manner of oddness, inspiration, or, dare we way, hope you may find in the nocturnal realm of slumber.

Sometimes, you work for so long on something, just to realize that the end is not even in sight.

The experience is never the same twice. Explore the world of dreams that are much more freeing than the bounds of your desk in the daytime.

Featuring entirely original music by Cicada, this game is sure to have you wondering what is wrong with you.

Supported Platforms: SteamVR, Oculus (Developed and tested on Rift S)
